property.description:
Full Floor | Luxury Penthouse | Upgraded

- 5 Bedroom 
- Maids Room
- Full Floor
- 5,918 Sq. Ft. 
- Lots of Outdoor Space
- Outdoor Jacuzzi 
- Full Burj Khalifa & Fountain View
- Upgraded
- Best Location in Downtown
- Pool / Gym
- Property Reference: DUB[redacted phone number]
- Agent: Lee Weston on [redacted phone number], RERA BRN No. 46189

If you are looking for a large premium apartment in the heart of Downtown, Dubai, this Five Bedroom + Maids apartment could be the one for you. With lots of outdoor space showcasing the incredible Burj Khalifa & Fountain Views, this rare to market apartment is not one to be missed. Call today to find out more & to arrange a viewing. 

Finance is available on this property through Allsopp & Allsopp Mortgage Services. 

Please call Lee Weston on [redacted phone number] for more or to arrange a viewing. 

Please note all measurements and information are given to the best of our knowledge. Allsopp & Allsopp accept no liability for any incorrect details.
